channel.title: Rulereric files lawsuit against jagex!
channel.description: He called me and let me know he filed a lawsuit against Jagex, and that it was all public record and I could share it all that I want. But I'm getting ready to leave and I can't look for it yet, so I figured one of you guys could find it. Post links here.

item.title: Rulereric files lawsuit against jagex!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

t4:

so, i assume they still made money by doing this - as in, they’re not in debt from what happened?

I imagine not. If they already have the house paid off (not sure if they do). Then just that alone could pay the lawsuit off. I’m sure they have other assets that they acquired over the years; cars, televisions, etc, plus anything they had saved in the bank. I’m sure they turned a profit.

Read full topic

item.title: Rulereric files lawsuit against jagex!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Holy shit, that’s ridiculous. I expected they made something like $10,000 per month or so, but never enough to buy a place like that.

Mopman:

i like that even with a million dollars they ended up living together

I thought that was funny too, but, honestly, in a 9000 sq ft house you could live ‘with’ someone for years and probably not see them ever, right?

Read full topic

item.title: Rulereric files lawsuit against jagex!
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:110, topic:419963”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=522522.msg3897335#msg3897335 date=1327431275]

Even more reason to keep code open source. They sued impsoft to stop the bot, and no amount of suing would stop an open source bot.
[/quote]I think that RSBot disagrees

Was there a lawsuit involved there? I was under the impression it was just a threat (which are free!).

Also, it didn’t really stop it did it? Didn’t many others just fork it off and continue the bot?[/quote]They’re about to launch a lawsuit aganist the current owner.

The bot is dead already, current owner is just trying to pretend like he is able to update it, and none of the people who are capable have any interest in doing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rulereric files lawsuit against jagex!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:116, topic:419963”][quote author=Ollie link=topic=522522.msg3897350#msg3897350 date=1327432417]
the brothers have a nice house, paid for with bot money.

http://visulate.com/property/209978

https://www.brevardpropertyappraiser.com/asp/Show_parcel.asp?acct=2536382&gen=T&tax=T&bld=T&oth=T&sal=T&lnd=T&leg=T&GoWhere=real_search.asp&SearchBy=Tax
[/quote]Wtf a million dollars? Did they really make that much?[/quote]

Easily… If they had 1,000 users paying 15 dollars recurring monthly for a single script (which is what they charged for the most part I believe). Then that is 15,000 per month, times 12 months is 180,000 a year. And to say they only had 1,000 paying users is a VAST understatement. I expect the year before they were shut down they made 6 or 7 figures…

Read full topic

item.title: Rulereric files lawsuit against jagex!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:112, topic:419963”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=522522.msg3897399#msg3897399 date=1327438902]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=522522.msg3897335#msg3897335 date=1327431275]

Even more reason to keep code open source. They sued impsoft to stop the bot, and no amount of suing would stop an open source bot.
[/quote]I think that RSBot disagrees

Was there a lawsuit involved there? I was under the impression it was just a threat (which are free!).[/quote]

I can vouch that Speljohan cannot work on any bots for runescape and that jagex has a legal basis to prevent him from doing so.[/quote]

I know about that, but just because he signed an agreement with them. He didn’t have to, and chances are they wouldn’t have brought it to court.

Read full topic

item.title: Rulereric files lawsuit against jagex!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:112, topic:419963”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=522522.msg3897399#msg3897399 date=1327438902]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=522522.msg3897335#msg3897335 date=1327431275]

Even more reason to keep code open source. They sued impsoft to stop the bot, and no amount of suing would stop an open source bot.
[/quote]I think that RSBot disagrees

Was there a lawsuit involved there? I was under the impression it was just a threat (which are free!).[/quote]

I can vouch that Speljohan cannot work on any bots for runescape and that jagex has a legal basis to prevent him from doing so.[/quote]

Pretty sure that was because of zetabot.

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:110, topic:419963”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=522522.msg3897335#msg3897335 date=1327431275]

Even more reason to keep code open source. They sued impsoft to stop the bot, and no amount of suing would stop an open source bot.
[/quote]I think that RSBot disagrees

Was there a lawsuit involved there? I was under the impression it was just a threat (which are free!).

Also, it didn’t really stop it did it? Didn’t many others just fork it off and continue the bot?[/quote]

I thought they had to move their site several countries away from U.S. and British laws, so Jagex couldn’t do anything to them.

Read full topic
